body.p: We the undersigned Citizens of District No 4 in Breathitt County Reccommend to his Excellency B Magoffin Govenor of this Comwealth John Guvin as a suitable person to fill the office of Justice of the peace of Breathitt County in said District this 18 -- day of June 1861 the vacancy occasioned by the Resignation of A J Smith this 18th day of June 1861
go to the Gov & get him to make this appointment I have lost Jacks resignation

Breathitt Co
J. P.
Dist No. 4
Jno Guvins
